website_summaries.verdict: This heater attaches to a patio umbrella or another pole to warm up chilly gatherings.
pros: Attaches to any standard patio table umbrella pole
Each arm puts out 500 watts of power
Can be used with an umbrella or clamped onto another pole
Helps with chilly evenings in southern climates
cons: Can only be used with a pole

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Bought one several years ago for my ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Bought one several years ago for my house in CT. We winter in FL and as this season has been unusually cold so far, I purchased one for our home here. As I am using it on my lanai, there is no umbrella to connect it to. So I bought a stand and a pole to hang it from. I can move it around as needed. It would be a great option if the manufacturer offered that as an accessory. I have used both the table top and floor model propane heaters in the past and this product is a much better option for me.
customer_reviews.author: Joe R.

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: Tried it for the first time this weekend as the evening started to cool down. It worked just as described - can't wait to use it in conjunction with our propane tank top heater when winter sets in.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Great Heater
customer_reviews.text: This heater is amazing!! It works exactly as it was described to!! The only option that I wished that it had would be a blower to push the heat down faster?!? But, I do highly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Burford

customer_reviews.title: Just OK hoped for better
customer_reviews.text: Received the item with no problems. The quality seemed good. The assembly went without a hitch. Unfortunately it barely puts out any heat. The manufacturer could improve the design by installing two heat bars in each of the three blades. The nice thing is that it gives off plenty of light which I was missing under our umbrella. For a very moderate evening say in the 60's it helps take off the chill a little bit. I suppose it's better than nothing and the price is not bad so I am keeping it but am a little disappointed it does not put out more heat.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT! YOU WONT REGRET IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great idea for a heater! Perfect heat output, great lighting, we love EVERYTHING about it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennie L Vertefeuille

customer_reviews.title: Defective Item
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item on November 29, 2012 as a Christmas gift from my parents to my husband and I. The first time I went to use it wasn't until April 13, 2013. Two of the three halogen lights did not work. As the time has expired for an exchange and product is discontinued, the seller, stsmith78, has been kind enough to reimburse me for this product. If you decide to purchase this item, check it out as soon as it's delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Reggie

customer_reviews.title: More heat
customer_reviews.text: Great idea but I was expecting a bit more heat from it.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Au

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: First time i used it heater worked great ,when i went to fold it down the sides broke ?
customer_reviews.author: frank maida

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for semi shielded areas
customer_reviews.text: This is a great source of heat for smaller semi closed areas. Windy areas will not be a good match for this item.
customer_reviews.author: tanya hanna

customer_reviews.title: Nothing Like Heat on the Patio When It's COLD
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I are completely satisified. It's easy enough to clamp onto the umbrella pole by the way the slotted section removes and forms a "U" shape groove for it to slip right onto the pole. Then you simply slide the slotted insert back in and tighten the knob. Because it's so easy to install, we bring the unit in the house during the week and take it back out on the weekend. You can easily adjust the height of where you want to locate it on the pole. It's an exceptional value.
customer_reviews.author: D. P. Risley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to warm up the patio table area!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for taking the chill off CA nights. Have had this since 2010 and use for my holiday parties. Easy to put up and take down. I have an 8-top table and it was a popular spot when the night turned brisk.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't really heat when not standing directly underneath it and Not usable for outdoors at all!! 1500 BTU's is not enough to produce any heat more than 2feet away. Bright orange/red light is giving FALSE impression that unit is hot and giving off great heat which is NOT TRUE). WASTE OF MONEY!!
customer_reviews.author: A.W.H.

customer_reviews.title: Not very warm
customer_reviews.text: In order to get warm you have to drop the heater down really low on the umbrella pole. I thought this would be a handy device to keep everyone warm at the table but it just really doesn't warm things that much even with it dropped down and blocking your view of everyone else. Not worth the cash.
customer_reviews.author: Denise W

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced for the heat output
customer_reviews.text: This heater does not give off a lot of heat. I would say if this product cost 30 bucks, MAYBE I would buy it again. That is a HUGE maybe
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great? Way better than gas heat
customer_reviews.text: Works great? Way better than gas heat, more all over heat. This is our second one, first one lasted about 8 years. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: Warm and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this under my patio on a pole i fixed from the roof. Works great as long as its not windy, something i mean to fix with some screens. I'm outside every weekend with friends and havent noticed much of a change in my electric bill from when we used just our jackets to keep warm.
customer_reviews.author: PcItalian

customer_reviews.title: Not thrilled, but OK.
customer_reviews.text: Needed some sort of heater on the patio, and I was debating propane vs electric. This heater does take the chill off, but not as effective as propane. It creates a bright light, so if you want a little heat and alot of light it works well; I have since bought a used short propane heater, and the two together work very well!
customer_reviews.author: Mav

customer_reviews.title: I wish that it gave off more heat than it ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish that it gave off more heat than it does. It will take the chill off but don't expect to stay really warm.
customer_reviews.author: FCI

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS!!! Even better than I expected. Easy to install and remove. Heats up fast and cools down quickly. Fits my oversize umbrella pole.
customer_reviews.author: unlisted

customer_reviews.title: christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: It was a christmas gift to my son.It give good heat for a cool night , not a cold night. It also give off a good night light.
customer_reviews.author: Tony B.

customer_reviews.title: Not good for cold climates
customer_reviews.text: The unit arrived in timely fashion and "worked" as advertised. The only problem is that it does not put out enough BTU's for a cold climate. I live in the Chicago area and wanted to use it for cool fall evenings. The night I first used it, it was about 40 degrees outside. I could not feel any heat being put out. I think it will work best when the low temps are in the 60's. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: T. Lonergan

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Heat control switches are a great idea for controlling low and high heat. Mounts easily.
customer_reviews.author: Ray R.

customer_reviews.title: Well-built, but does not produce much heat
customer_reviews.text: This serves as a great light, but does not produce enough heat to be marketed as a "heater". You'd have to be dangerously close to the heating element for this to be useful.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It does whati it claims looks good and I would recomend it if that is what you are looking for.
customer_reviews.author: S. Piontkowski

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: installed in a gazebo and it works great for heat and light
customer_reviews.author: John Gullage

customer_reviews.title: Works advertised
customer_reviews.text: Perfect in every way. Installation was easy peasy. Heat is good. Heats well on a 60+ degree day without wind. Couldn't ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: Queen aleta

customer_reviews.title: Not a huge source of heat in outside conditions.
customer_reviews.text: It does not get as warm as expected. You will need to use this very close to bottom of pole near people to even notive rhe difference.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Great idea- One less thing on the table
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little heater, and I'd defiantly buy it again! You have the freedom to decide how much heat you need by being able to turn on one, two, or all three heat lamps at once. If you want more heat, you can even slide the heater down the pole closer to where you are sitting. It accommodates a 1.5" to 2" diameter umbrella pole so it fits the standard poles on the market.
customer_reviews.author: NZ.Nick

customer_reviews.title: Bad Product
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. I live in Southern Calif and tried the product out on a slightly cool evening (59 degrees). The temp was only slightly uncomfortable, but the heater did NOT add any noticeable heat. Of course I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: lalawsooner

customer_reviews.title: We love our umbrella heater
customer_reviews.text: We love our umbrella heater. Works great. But if the wind is blowing or below 40 it is best to go inside anyway. This works fantastic to take the chill of the night air - but it will not heat the great outdoors. It gives us extended time and days on our patio!
customer_reviews.author: Paul B.

customer_reviews.title: Weak Heater
customer_reviews.text: About all this heater does well is produce light at night. The heating feature is very weak and is barely felt while sitting at my outside table of four. I don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brady Ambler

product_meta.title: Fire Sense Umbrella Halogen Patio Heater | Steel Construction | 3 Heating Heads | 3 x 500 Watts | Standard 110V Household Current | Suitable for Indoor and Outdoor Use | 8 Foot Non Retractable Cord
product_meta.description:
Enjoy your patio in all seasons with this Umbrella Halogen Patio Heater by Fire Sense.

This heat lamp runs exclusively on your regular 110V household electric current. This makes the heater substantially less expensive to operate compared to traditional gas and propane patio heaters. Additionally, due to it running on electricity, it produces no harmful emissions or toxic residuals, making it safe to be used indoors as well.

This outdoor patio heater provides you with instantaneous heat so you can warm up quicker than before and uses about a tenth of the energy of LPG tanks. The umbrella patio heater features 3 heating heads and each provides you with 500 watts of heat, providing you a combined total of 1500 watts of energy and heat. It also ensures that there is no wasteful heating of the air around you.

The halogen heater features a durable and lightweight steel construction with a gorgeous black finish that makes the heater very versatile. The stainless steel patio heater has been designed to be easily attached to any standard patio table umbrella center pole. It features a unique locking system, allowing the 3 heads to be lowered and closed along with the umbrella. To open the heater, simply raise the heads individually until they click into place with the spring loaded locking pins.

With this electric patio heater, you also get an 8 foot non retractable electrical cord. This unit must run on a dedicated circuit for optimum performance.

This Fire Sense patio heater is a revolutionary piece of technology in indoor and outdoor heating and provides perfect overhead heating for catching up with friends over a cup of coffee.

Indoor/outdoor infrared heater produces no harmful UV rays
Silent operation and full heat output within seconds
Powered by standard household outlet; infrared heat unaffected by wind
Measures 39 by 4 by 3.3 inches; weighs 8 pounds
